title: energy boost - aromatherapy bath bomb
description: Latika's aromatherapy collection is made with 100% pure essential oils for a highly beneficial and aromatic bath experience. ultra-moisturizing made without artificial color or fragrance aromatherapy- made with 100% pure essential oils - lemongrass & spearmint
cleaned_text: - aromatherapy is based on the usage of aromatic materials such as essential oils, to promote health and well-being. - these bath bombs are made without artificial color or fragrance and contain herbal or clay additives along with essential oils. - this indulgent, ultra-moisturizing bath bomb will leave your skin soft and glowing, and your tub mess-free! all of Latika's bath bombs are moisturizing | aromatic | mess-free ULTRA-MOISTURIZING FIVE-OIL BLEND- all Latika bath bombs are made by us using: avocado oil coconut oil shea butter grapeseed oil sweet almond oil [view the full energy
